text: burning it with brimstone and the heat of salt, so that it cannot be sown any more, nor any green thing grow therein, after the example of the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah, Adema and Siboin, which the Lord destroyed in his wrath and indignation.

segments.text: burning it with brimstone and the heat of salt, so that it cannot be sown any more, nor any
green thing grow therein, after the example of the destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah,
Adema and Siboin, which the Lord destroyed in his wrath and indignation.
